description:
Urabe Yukito was the son of the founder of a shady sect, but when he dies in a crazy ritual, he is reborn in another world where the concept of gods and religion does not exist. This should be an ideal world for him, but then...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: We Know We Are Not Worthy O Great Lord Mitama Please Purify Us Please Cleanse Us Lord Mitama We Beg for You to Hear Our Prayer
Ô déesse Mitama, je t’invoque. Disperse nos craintes, purifie nos cœurs et purge nos âmes. Ô déesse, je t’implore, entends nos prières
カケマクモカシコキ ミタマノオホミカミ ハラヒタマヘキヨメタマヘト ミタマノミコト カシコミカシコミマヲス
